intro.caption: Perfect your technique. Sparr without injuries. Experience real fighting.

copy: You put on your VR helmet and enter the virtual ring.
Once there you spot your opponent in the opposite corner. He's someone just like you, connected into the virtual ring from some other place in the world.
The bell rings, you circle each other, searching for an opening.
Some shots are thrown and when one of them lands, it registers as a hit, yet no one is injured.
Because you're not hitting each other, you're all alone in your ring, facing a digital ghosts.

propositions.title: A Coach's Perspective
propositions.text: Your coach knows you best because he sees you from every angle. Stop recording yourself in 2D and enter the virtual 3D space and gain the same perspective as your coach!

propositions.title: Training Simulator
propositions.text: Wanted to do pads but nobody had time to help? Gain access to a virtual coach any time you want.

propositions.title: Sparr without injuries
propositions.text: Forget about avoiding damage and focus only on improving your movements, reflexes and perfecting your skills.
